title: 08/13/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/13/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Mac Jones' debut with the Patriots and why he will never live up to what Tom Brady was despite having a better college career. He believes another rookie quarterback is destined to shine on what we've seen in training camp so far. He also gives high praise to Major League Baseball for the Field of Dreams game and why they need to become more like the NFL. Plus, 6-time All Star Jermaine O'Neal joins the show to talk about his behind the scenes documentary about what really happened at "The Malice At The Palace". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
